painPoints.title: Multi-Country Operations Complexity
painPoints.description: Operating across 13 African countries creates quote and pricing complexity. Need unified CPQ solution for consistent enterprise quotes across markets.

painPoints.title: Manual Quote Processes Slow Enterprise Sales
painPoints.description: Enterprise fiber deals taking weeks to quote due to manual processes. Competing against faster telcos for enterprise contracts.

opportunities.title: Enterprise Fiber CPQ Expansion
opportunities.description: Expand CloudSense to handle complex multi-site fiber connectivity quotes across African markets

opportunities.title: Data Center Services Quoting
opportunities.description: Add data center and cloud connectivity services to CPQ platform as Liquid expands data center footprint
